name: Crobble
description:
"Crobble is timeless, intelligent, fiendishly good fun" - 9/10 - Touch Arcade

"It's relentless, and it makes every moment playing it feel intense." - Pocket Gamer

Put your vocabulary and reflexes to the test in Crobble, the unique and captivating word game that blends SCRABBLE with Tetris!

TAP on falling letter tiles to create words

EXPLODE bombs to make space for more letters

TILT your device to change the gravity

ENJOY three different game modes* all with fresh twists on the fun Crobble gameplay

*Requires single in-game purchase to unlock
